    A Scorekeeper Vignette

Function reference

All functions

binge_raw
ALSPAC binge eating example dataset with 6 binge eating variables assessed
binge_scoresheet
ALSPAC binge eating example scoresheet - Age 14 (ccq) variables
case_when_vars()
case_when function
filter_at_vars()
filter_at_vars filter_at_vars allows you to filter rows of a dataset based on values of specified columns
if_else_vars()
If_else_vars
n_val_lab_func()
value labels function
recode_vars()
The recode_vars function recodes variables according to scoresheet instructions
rename_vars()
Rename Function
score()
score function The score function completes all scoring for a single step of a scoresheet. operations are conducted in the following order: select, if_else, recode, sum, case_when, filter_at
scorekeep()
Scores raw data in a step-by-step fashion using scoresheet provided
select_vars()
Select Variables Using scoresheet
sum_vars()
Sum variables using scoresheet
